metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8758 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in unspecified frontendcomponents in TYPO3 6.2.x before 6.2.16 and 7.x before 7.6.1 allow remoteauthenticated editors to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unknownvectors.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
